===Noun===

# [[woman]]; [[adult]] [[female]]

# {{lb|zh|colloquial}} [[wife]]
# {{lb|zh|colloquial}} [[lover]]; [[mistress]]

====Usage notes====
* When referring to an adult female in a neutral sense, {{zh-l|婦女}} and {{zh-l|女的}} are often preferred, as {{zh-l|女人}} can carry potentially offensive connotations of a female of low social standing or worth (similar to {{m|en|woman}} and {{m|en|lady}} in English).

* {{zh-l|女的}}
* {{zh-l|女子}}
